spec_data.Name: libzeitgeist
spec_data.Description:
This project provides a client library for applications that want to interact
with the Zeitgeist daemon. The library is written in C using glib and provides
an asynchronous GObject oriented API.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 04 Aug 2017 02:43:05 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Client library for applications that want to interact with the Zeitgeist daemon
